about_the_game:
Jack and Kenne is a Beat up, which takes place in a comic book, the player will control an Alligator named Jack and he intends to save Kenne the Rabbit, she was kidnapped by Marcos the Deer!! Jack will have to go from page to page facing Markos' gang to save Kenne.

● This game is heavily inspired by the classic "Comix Zone" "Battletoads", and the "Beastars" Series

● Super tight control schemes designed for keyboards and controllers.

● Compatibility with PS4 XBOX Controllers,

● Artistic, hand-drawn style.

● High difficulty with many different enemies

● only has 1 playable character, Single Player

STORY
●An artist's boss calls him at night and tells him to create a comic aimed at a teen audience and wants to see the comic in the morning on his desk or he will be fired from his job, so she sees it who doesn't have much time, draws an alligator called Jacke, and writes a plot, which will be Jacke trying to save Kenne Rabbit from the terrible Markos Deer, Jacke he will have to face all Marcos' henchmen to recover his girlfriend Kenne.
detailed_description:
NEW: REVENGE ON THE STREETS 3


REVENGE ON THE STREETS 2


REVENGE ON THE STREETS


About the Game

Jack and Kenne is a Beat up, which takes place in a comic book, the player will control an Alligator named Jack and he intends to save Kenne the Rabbit, she was kidnapped by Marcos the Deer!! Jack will have to go from page to page facing Markos' gang to save Kenne.

● This game is heavily inspired by the classic "Comix Zone" "Battletoads", and the "Beastars" Series

● Super tight control schemes designed for keyboards and controllers.

● Compatibility with PS4 XBOX Controllers,

● Artistic, hand-drawn style.

● High difficulty with many different enemies

● only has 1 playable character, Single Player

STORY
●An artist's boss calls him at night and tells him to create a comic aimed at a teen audience and wants to see the comic in the morning on his desk or he will be fired from his job, so she sees it who doesn't have much time, draws an alligator called Jacke, and writes a plot, which will be Jacke trying to save Kenne Rabbit from the terrible Markos Deer, Jacke he will have to face all Marcos' henchmen to recover his girlfriend Kenne.
name: Jack and Kenne

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 3,7 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 TI 2GB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
